item.title: Please help me!
item.dc:creator: @bobbie1990 bobbie1990
item.description:
@bobbie1990 wrote:

Hello i just downloded a new source… and in the source is was somthing that i have looked for in days ;D (source is: Dragon-History)

On the quest list it is construction!
but how can i change the items to build? it is like this:

Texthandler.java:

if(c.playerLevel[21] >= 90) {
c.sendQuest("@gre@Confusion Door (lvl 90)", 7337);
}
if(c.playerLevel[21] < 90) {
c.sendQuest(“Confusion Door (lvl 90)”, 7337);
}

and where i change the thing to spawn and stuff? witch file? and what to search for?

please help me, and sorry for bad spelling! (if you dont know what i mean, pelase reply it so i can try to tell it on a bether way)

-Meele

Read full topic
